name: Broiled Sweet Potatoes
author: Maria Watson
summary: This is a recipe of my great-grandmother's that I grew up with. It is a favorite of mine and I try to make it often for my family.
directions: Line a 10x15 inch cookie sheet with aluminum foil
Cook the sweet potatoes in the microwave until done, about 4 minutes per potato
When the potatoes are cool, peel, cut in half lengthwise and slice about 1/4 inch
Place the potato slices in a single layer on prepared cookie sheet
Slice the butter into about 1/8 inch pats and place all over the sweet potatoes
Sprinkle the sugar on the potatoes and butter
Place under broiler until golden and bubbly, about 5 to 8 minutes
